scripts.build:mobile: dotenv -e ../../../envs/.env.production.mobile -e ../../../envs/.env.local.mobile -- next build && npm run mobile:assets
scripts.build:mobile:android: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.build:mobile:ios: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.dev:mobile:android: dotenv -e ../../../envs/.env.development.mobile -e ../../../envs/.env.local.mobile -- npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.dev:mobile:ios: dotenv -e ../../../envs/.env.development.mobile -e ../../../envs/.env.local.mobile -- npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.mobile:init: npx cap add ios && npx cap add android
